meanings.definition: Inducing a hypnotic state in oneself.
meanings.sent1: She practiced autohypnotic techniques to relax before bed.
meanings.sent2: The autohypnotic music helped her fall asleep faster.
meanings.sent3: He jokingly claimed his autohypnotic powers could make anyone dance uncontrollably.
meanings.sent4: The sunset cast an autohypnotic spell over the beach, mesmerizing all who watched.
meanings.sent5: The swirling patterns on the ceiling were almost autohypnotic in their effect.

meanings.sent1: Her autohypnotic abilities allowed her to manage stress effectively.
meanings.sent2: The book contained detailed instructions on autohypnotic practices.
meanings.sent3: The autohypnotic workshop promised to teach participants how to control their own thoughts.
meanings.sent4: His autohypnotic skills were so advanced, he could enter a trance-like state at will.
meanings.sent5: The autohypnotic session left her feeling refreshed and focused.
